patthana22.6:1.1: Nakusalaṃ noāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:2.1: Nakusalaṃ nanoāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.6:3.1: Nakusalaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
patthana22.6:4.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā kusalo anāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana22.6:5.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavasampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:6.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavavippayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.6:7.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavañceva naanāsavañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva sāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:8.1: Nakusalaṃ naanāsavañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo sāsavo ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā nava, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
patthana22.6:9.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavañceva naāsavavippayuttañca dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavo ceva āsavasampayutto ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:10.1: Nakusalaṃ naāsavavippayuttañceva nano ca āsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo āsavasampayutto ceva no ca āsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana22.6:11.1: Nakusalaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ nasāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato āsavavippayutto sāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā pañca, adhipatiyā pañca …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate pañca.
